description: For more than four decades, George Carlin has made us laugh with his provocative style of stand-up comedy. This HBO special presentation highlights the best of his live performances in Los Angeles, New Jersey, Phoenix and New York...
keywords: clip show,stand up,stand up comedy,stand up comedian,tv special
name: George Carlin: Personal Favorites

review.name: Excellent Compilation
review.reviewBody: George Carlin's latest collection of some more best of bits (a continuation of his 1996 video Best Stuff) is a refreshing and of course as usual hilarious retread and is a great retrospective for any Carlin fan or just comedy fan in general. The best bits: Dog Incident, Hitler, Al Sleet, and It's Not a Sport, plus a fine beginning segment with George trying on different hats. A+
